name: Radio
description: A radio button component from Fluent UI that allows users to select a single option from a group of mutually exclusive choices.

props.name: checked
props.description: Whether the radio button is checked

props.name: defaultChecked
props.description: Default checked state for uncontrolled radio

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the radio button is disabled

props.name: label
props.description: Label to display next to the radio button

props.name: name
props.description: Name attribute for the radio button group

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the radio button is selected
